category.name: Product Structure.PSE Assembly
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSEAutoViCreateEmptyVI
preference.preference_description: Determines whether a variant item is created when a non-module is encountered during automatic variant item creation. Valid Values: true - A variant item is created for a given BOM line when a non-module is encountered. The system continues to the bottom of the generic structure, assigning empty variant items (variant items with no variant configuration) for each item that is not a module. false - A variant item is not created for a given BOM line when a non-module is encountered.
